skills.name: THICK SKIN
desc: • Deals 3 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Remove Perfect Immunity from the enemy
• 55% Chance to grant Perfect Immunity to each ally.

skills.name: UNYIELDING
desc: • Deals 3 hits of random damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to grant Affinity Advantage, Perfect Hit, or Charge to self and a random ally each hit.

skills.name: ECHO
desc: Gain Echo Status for 6 turns at the start of battle. Echo Status grants a 35% Chance to get an Extra Turn after performing an action
